alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:17AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Toombs, Telfair, southern Wheeler and southwestern Montgomery Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 917 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Little Ocmulgee State Park to near McRae to near Workmore to near Browning, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Helena, Lumber City, Scotland, Towns, Horse Creek Wma, Spring Hill, McNatt Falls, Temperance, Little Ocmulgee State Park, Jordan, Charlotteville and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
